// ==UserScript==
// @name         New Userscript
// @namespace    https://m.webshop.cashconverters.com.au/item
// @version      0.1

// @author       You
// @match        https://m.webshop.cashconverters.com.au/item*

/* jshint -W097 */
'use strict';

var url;

if(document.URL.indexOf('https://m.webshop.cashconverters.com.au/items/') >= 0)
{
    setTimeout(back, 5000);

}
else
{
    setTimeout(search, 1000);
}

function search()
{
    url = window.location.href.substring(45, 52);
    
    if(document.title.indexOf('Nintendo') >= 0)
    {
        checkBuyable();
    }
    else
    {
        url++;
        window.location.href = ("http://m.webshop.cashconverters.com.au/item/".concat(url));
    }

}

function checkBuyable()
{
    //check if this is an auction
        if (/(A sTore you DontWant to Find)|(This item is currently in your basket.)/i.test (document.body.innerHTML) )
        {
            beep();
            url++;
            window.location.href = ("http://m.webshop.cashconverters.com.au/item/".concat(url));
        }
        else if (/(Time Left)|(????)/i.test (document.body.innerHTML) )
        {
            beep();
            window.open("https://webshop.cashconverters.com.au/item/".concat(url),'_blank');
            url++;
            window.location.href = ("http://m.webshop.cashconverters.com.au/item/".concat(url));
        }
        else if (/(Buy it Now)|(????)/i.test (document.body.innerHTML) )
        {
            document.getElementsByTagName('form')[2].submit();
        }
        
        else if (/(This item will remain in your basket for 2 hours.)|(MEEEEEEEEEOW)/i.test (document.body.innerHTML) )
        {
            //url--;
            window.location.href = ("http://m.webshop.cashconverters.com.au/item/".concat(url));
        }
}

function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires;
}

function getCookie(cname)
{
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i=0; i<ca.length; i++) {
        var c = ca[i];
        while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1);
        if (c.indexOf(name) === 0) return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
    }
    return "";
}

function back()
{
    url = document.referrer;
    //window.location.href = ("http://m.webshop.cashconverters.com.au/item/".concat(url));
    window.history.back();
    //window.alert(url);
}

function beep()
{
    var snd = new Audio("data:audio/wav;base64,");  
    snd.play();
}
